atk-s0401a9:1_0: 81. Navamassāpi paṭhamaṁ aṭṭhuppattiyameva kathitaṁ. Sambahulā kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṁ
atk-s0401a9:1_1: nisinnā kumbhaghosakaṁ ārabbha ‘‘asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe appayasaṁ appaparivāraṁ
atk-s0401a9:1_2: ahosi, idāni mahāyasaṁ mahāparivāraṁ jāta’’nti kathayiṁsu. Satthā purimanayeneva
atk-s0401a9:1_3: āgantvā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā imaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0401a9:2: 82. Dutiyādīsu mahato anatthāyāti mahantassa anatthassa atthāya. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
